title: Unitrax
description: Unitrax is a (SaaS) product that serves as a comprehensive investor record-keeping system specifically designed for the Canadian financial services industry. It enables fund manufacturers, banks, and insurance providers to manage their investor records and fulfill regulatory obligations across a wide range of products, including mutual funds, GICs, and insurance-linked investments, under a single platform

title: Document360
description: Document360 is an AI-powered knowledge base platform that helps businesses create, manage, and publish online documentation for both customers and internal teams. It allows companies to build self-service knowledge bases, product manuals, and internal wikis, with features like an enhanced editor, analytics, and AI-assisted content creation to improve the documentation process and user experience.
